all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Go your way whithersoever I will, and it shall be given you by the Comforter what you shall do and whither you shall go.
Doctrine and Covenants 31:11
Quote of the Day
"We do not gather on the Sabbath simply to attend sacrament meeting and check it off the list. We come together to worship."
Patrick Kearon | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
